    public class TPPetsEntityListener
extends java.lang.Object

    The event listener that handles entity events

    • Method Detail

      • onEntityTeleportEvent

        public void onEntityTeleportEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityTeleportEvent e)
        Event handler for EntityTeleportEvent. It checks if the entity is a pet that's teleporting into a ProtectedRegion or teleporting out of a LostAndFoundRegion and prevents that. Note that entities can be teleported out of the LostAndFoundRegion with the command, just not through natural mob behavior.
        Parameters:
        e - The event

      • onEntityDeathEvent

        public void onEntityDeathEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent e)
        Event handler for EntityDeathEvent. It removes it from the database if it was a previously tracked pet.
        Parameters:
        e - The event

      • onEntityDamageByEntityEvent

        public void onEntityDamageByEntityEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent e)
        Event handler for EntityDamageByEntityEvent. It prevents player damage and mob damage, even through potions and arrows.
        Parameters:
        e - The event.

      • onEntityDamageEvent

        public void onEntityDamageEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent e)
        Event handler for EntityDamageEvent. It prevents environmental damage.
        Parameters:
        e - The event

      • onEntityTameEvent

        public void onEntityTameEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityTameEvent e)
        Event handler for EntityTameEvent. It checks if the tamed entity should be allowed to be tamed based on the pet limits. If it can, it adds that to the PlayerPetIndex
        Parameters:
        e - The EntityTameEvent object to respond to

      • onEntityMountEvent

        public void onEntityMountEvent(org.spigotmc.event.entity.EntityMountEvent e)
        Event handler for EntityMountEvent. It checks if the player is allowed to mount that pet, using isAllowedToMount(Player, Entity), and cancels it if they aren't
        Parameters:
        e - The EntityMountEvent object to respond to

      • isAllowedToMount

        private boolean isAllowedToMount(org.bukkit.entity.Player pl,
                                 org.bukkit.entity.Entity ent)
        Checks if a player is allowed to mount a given entity
        Parameters:
        pl - The player attempting to mount
        ent - The entity the player is attempting to mount
        Returns:
        True if they're allowed, false if they're not
